Key Match Events: Giorgos Masouras scored in the 33rd minute after Manuel Neuer spilled the ball
Kai Havertz leveled the score in the 55th minute with a deflected shot
Pascal Gross scored the winner in the 89th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Julian Nagelsmann confirmed Kai Havertz will start in attack at the Euros
Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann committed to having Manuel Neuer as his first-choice goalkeeper for Euro 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Toni Kroos said Germany gifted the ball away too often and were hit on the break
Julian Nagelsmann said the second half was better than the first, but Germany lost possession far too many times in the first half
Julian Nagelsmann confirmed Germany will meet up on Monday to start preparing for Scotland
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany had to come from a goal down to snatch a last-gasp 2-1 victory over Greece
The match was a lacklustre dress rehearsal ahead of next week's tournament start
Germany started pressing higher after the break with coach Julian Nagelsmann making five substitutions in the second half
Others: Alexander NÃ¼bel was cut from the 26-player squad for the tournament
Germany play Hungary and Switzerland in their Euro Group A
